basics.name: Eunjung Yeo
basics.label: Researcher, Computational Linguist
basics.summary: A computational linguist specializing in Speech AI applications for pathological speech, with a strong focus on computational phonetics and phonology.

location.address: Gates Hillman Complex, 4902 Forbes Ave, Pittsburgh

courses: Speech AI for Korean Dysarthric Speech

Research Experience.name: ChangeLing Lab, Language Technologies Institute, Carnegie Mellon University
Research Experience.summary: Research on computational phonetics and phonology, with a special focus on speech AI applications for pathological speech.
highlights: cross-language intelligibility assessment for dysarthric speech

Research Experience.name: Spoken Language Processing Lab, Linguistics Department, Seoul National University
Research Experience.position: Ph.D. Student Researcher, M.A. Student Researcher
Research Experience.summary: Research on automatic speech assessment on pathologcial speech & nonnative speech

Research Experience.name: Department of Speech-Language Pathology, Yonsei University
Research Experience.summary: Research on motor speech disorders (Parkinson's). Collected and Analyzed cognitive, speech, swallowing data from healthy elderly individuals.

Research Experience.name: Institute of Language and Information Studies, Yonsei University
Research Experience.summary: Drafted Korean digital dictionary & Collected L2 Korean writing data.

projects.name: Development of Digital Therapeutics to Improve Communication Skills of Autistic Patients
projects.summary: Developed an automatic detection system for children with autism.
projects.organization: Korean Institute for Information & Communication Technology Planning & Evaluation

projects.name: Acquiring and Utilizing Audio Big Data for Healthcare Service Design
projects.summary: Designed a speech corpus of chronic kidney disease patients and developed an automatic detection and severity classification system for chronic kidney disease patients.
projects.organization: Korean Ministry of Science and ICT

projects.name: Korean Speech Data for Western and Asian Language Users for Language Education
projects.summary: Trained an automatic phonetic transcription model and pronunciation proficiency assessment toolkit for L2 English Korean speakers.

projects.name: Multilingual Speech Data Collection for L2 Korean Learners
projects.summary: Trained an automatic phonetic transcription model for L2 Korean speech.

projects.name: Development of Intelligent Tool-Based Content Production and Enjoyment Support Technology Considering the Accessibility of the Weak in Social Communication
projects.summary: Developed an automatic speech recognition system for children with autism.

projects.name: A Study on the French Vowel Speech of Korean Learners
projects.summary: Collected speech and nasometer measurements from L2 French Korean speakers.
